Title: Ookami to Koushinryou VR
Description: ['Independent development circle ', Spicy Tails, " announced on that it is developing a virtual reality anime based on Isuna Hasekura's Spice & Wolf novels. Hasekura himself is writing a new scenario for the anime. It will have English subtitles. The television anime's voice actors Ami Koshimizu (Holo) and Jun Fukuyama (Kraft Lawrence) are returning. ", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' The anime is slated for release on HTC VIVE, Oculus Rift, and other platforms in early 2019. It will also be viewable on PC without a VR headset.
